name: DoppelQuest
description:
This is a prototype centered around controlling multiple characters.

It was created by [Programmer and Game Designer] Joseph Ruddiman (GalacticMoblin), [3D Modeller]  Cooper McGlinchey, [2D Artist] Samuel Smith, [Texture Artist] Harry Herbert and [Level Designer] George Lofting.

This was made for the Side Quest 2020 Week 2 Game Jam - The theme was "connections"
